FuncDef: This command specifies a prefix for which firewall functionality will apply within the domain. Prefixes cannot be shared or duplicated across multiple domains in the same routing context. A domain can contain multiple prefixes.

ParaDef.Info: Mandatory keyword used when creating a prefix entry.
Specifies the prefix. Values-prefix - x:x:x:x:x:x:x:x (eight 16-bit pieces).
